sentence: RELATED: Ron DeSantis wants to hijack Florida redistricting and cut number of Black districts in half "The judge recognizes that this map is unlawful and diminishes African Americans' ability to elect representatives of their choice," Lawson said in a statement to the Associated Press after the hearing.
author: Igor Derysh
title: DeSantis-appointed judge says his map is an unconstitutional assault on Black voting power
